mapper.insert: insert into prod (prod_id, prod_name, prod_reguser, prod_upduser, prod_category, prod_brand, prod_image, company_code, prod_remarks) values (#{prod_id}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_reguser}, #{prod_upduser}, #{prod_category}, #{prod_brand}, #{prod_image}, #{company_code}, #{prod_remarks})
mapper.select: select p.prod_id, coalesce(sum(s.prod_qty), 0) as prod_qty, p.prod_name, p.prod_category, date_format(p.prod_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d (%a) %H:%i') as formatted_regdate, p.prod_brand, p.prod_image, c.company_name from prod p left join stock s on p.prod_id = s.prod_id join company c on p.company_code = c.company_code where p.prod_status != '02' group by p.prod_id

select *, date_format(p.prod_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d (%a) %H:%i') as formatted_regdate, date_format(p.prod_upddate, '%Y-%m-%d (%a) %H:%i') as formatted_upddate from prod p join company c on p.company_code = c.company_code where prod_id = #{prod_id} and prod_status != '02'

select p.prod_id, s.wh_number, s.prod_qty, w.wh_name, w.wh_location, w.wh_dt_location from prod p join stock s on p.prod_id = s.prod_id join warehouse w on s.wh_number = w.wh_number where p.prod_id = #{prod_id} and p.prod_status != '02'
mapper.update: update prod set prod_status = '02' where prod_id = #{prod_id} and not exists (select 1 from stock where prod_id = #{prod_id} and prod_qty > 0)
mapper.insert: insert into stock (prod_id, wh_number, prod_qty) values (#{prod_id}, #{stock_wh}, #{stock_qty}) on duplicate key update prod_qty = coalesce(prod_qty, 0) + #{stock_qty}
mapper.select: select distinct p.prod_id, p.prod_name, p.prod_image from prod p join stock s on p.prod_id = s.prod_id where p.prod_status != '02'
select s.wh_number, w.wh_name, w.wh_location, w.wh_dt_location, s.prod_qty from stock s left join warehouse w on s.wh_number = w.wh_number where s.prod_id = #{prod_id}
select wh_number, wh_name, wh_location, wh_dt_location from warehouse
